mainView.jobDescription: Sharing a strong affinity with React, based in Paris.

projects.spotify: Advanced Spotify project undertaken in collaboration with my elder brother, the project initiator and lead. Explore new features and an enhanced user experience.
projects.newDelhi: Internal SAAS CMS Builder for Carrefour Voyages, specializing in rapid newsletter creation.
projects.asteria: Learn the most complex concepts of astronomy in a playful and guided manner, with rewards and a card collection as a bonus!
projects.carrefourVoyages: During my internship, I resolved tickets, integrated themes like Christmas or Halloween, and contributed to the maintenance of the main website.
projects.reading: Documentation of internal projects at Carrefour Voyages, including SAAS projects that I designed and documented. (DEMO VERSION)
